description.title: Network Packets at the University of Auckland
description.comment:
The data are measurements made on each packet of information that passes through the University of Auckland Internet Gateway. These measurement include a timestamp that represents the time at which the packet reached the network location, and the size of the packet, as a number of bytes.
The data set described herein is provided in a space-delimited ASCII text file format. This is a very small sample of just 46 packets.
